textshaping 0.3.6.9000

  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

textshaping (development version)

textshaping 0.3.62021-10-13

  • Fix a bug in fallback font loading which would crash the process if the font failed to load (#23)
  • Fixed bug that would reset fallback to the original font for short strings (#25)

textshaping 0.3.52021-06-09

  • Address an UBCSAN issue in packages linking to textshaping
  • Remove a few compiler warnings

textshaping 0.3.42021-05-11

  • Prepare textshaping for UCRT support
  • Address upstream changes in cpp11

textshaping 0.3.32021-03-16

  • Support static linking on macOS (#17, @jeroen)

textshaping 0.3.22021-03-10

  • Avoid overindexing fallbacks when no fallback is found

textshaping 0.3.12021-02-22

  • Try to avoid ASAN issue reported by CRAN

textshaping 0.3.02021-02-10

  • Add support for performing font fallback as part of the single-line shaping
  • Provide support for non-scalable fonts

textshaping 0.2.12020-11-13

  • Fix issues with the Solaris mock solution

textshaping 0.2.02020-11-12

  • Update C API to prepare for font fallback
  • Make sure it compiles on Solaris without system dependencies

textshaping 0.1.22020-10-08

  • Fix a bug in the interaction with the systemfonts font cache that could cause random crashes on some mac installations.

textshaping 0.1.12020-09-29

  • Small changes to comply with next cpp11 version

textshaping 0.1.02020-09-17

  • First release. Provide access to HarfBuzz shaping and FriBidi bidirectional script support.

Contents

Developed by Thomas Lin Pedersen.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
